label.name: name
label.oversteerSunInWindow: only when sun shines in the window

placeholder.windowOrientation: the bearing representing the perpendicular of the window to geographical north
placeholder.windowOffsetN: 90 - (optional) anti-clockwise offset from orientation for determination of whether the sun is coming through window.
placeholder.windowOffsetP: 90 - (optional) clockwise offset from orientation for determination of whether the sun is coming through window
placeholder.blindLevelDefault: blind position if no other used
placeholder.slatPosDefault: slat position if no other used
placeholder.blindLevelMin: minimum position if sun calculated position
placeholder.blindLevelMax: maximum position if sun calculated position
placeholder.sunControlMode: select if sun control is active and how it should working
placeholder.overwriteExpire: (opt) the duration a manual setting will remain
placeholder.sunFloorLength: (opt) the extent to which direct sunlight is to be allowed into the room through the window, defined as a length on the floor
placeholder.sunMinDelta: (opt) define the minimum change of the blind position
placeholder.oversteerBlindPos: blind position when the compare be the case
placeholder.smoothTime: (opt) prevents changes due to sun in the given time
placeholder.name: Name
placeholder.btnSort: sort all rules, Attention this can change the behavior!
placeholder.btnImport: Past rules from Clipboard to the list (append).
placeholder.ruleImportance: defined a importance how the rule should be work to overrides. Only Overrides with a higher or same importance can override the rule.
placeholder.ruleTopic: allows to define a seperate topic for outgoing message per rule, if not defined default topic will be used
placeholder.resetOverwrite: if checked manual overwrite will be reset when this rule becomes active the first time
placeholder.sunTopic: allows to define a seperate topic for outgoing message if level is set by sun control, if not defined default topic will be used
placeholder.oversteerTopic: allows to define a seperate topic for outgoing message if level is set by sun control oversteer, if not defined default topic of sun Control will be used
placeholder.ruleTimeDays: select days wherefore it should be valid
placeholder.ruleTimeMonths: select months wherefore it should be valid
placeholder.autoTrigger: automatic triggers new calculation of the blind position in a dynamic changing time interval
placeholder.startDelay2: delay any output to the first (or only) output on start (Node-Red start, Deplay, ...). Set to 0 to deactivate.

errors.invalid-blind-level: Given Blind-Position __pos__ is not a valid Position!
errors.smoothTimeToolong: The selected smooth is too long!!
errors.invalidOpenPosOffset: Invalid value for blind open position offset for the sun control!
errors.invalidClosedPosOffset: Invalid value for blind closed position offset for the sun control!
